short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 一个可以代理浏览器请求的神奇插件 （A Magical Extension for Proxying Browser Requests）

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
可以按照用户的想法，设置浏览器中请求的的格式。包括代理请求头字段、响应头字段、域名代理、页面发送请求。这些功能也可以组合使用，达到神奇的效果，对我们日常排查问题和问题的探索非常的有帮助。是一款操作简单，但功能十分强大的浏览器代理神奇插件
It is possible to configure the format of requests in the browser according to the user's preferences. This includes proxying request headers, response headers, domain proxying, and sending requests from pages. These features can also be combined to achieve remarkable effects, greatly aiding in the troubleshooting and exploration of issues in our daily work. It is a browser proxy plugin that is easy to use yet remarkably powerful.
